channel.title: How to fix that admin dosent loose item from death
channel.description: someone could help me plz? ... i dont remenbr how to change ( admin dosent losing stuff from death ) i wanna put it off so admin loose stuff. using 317 pi server ( erasedpkz )

item.title: How to fix that admin dosent loose item from death
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

well I don’t know 317’s but in your main class find your death method… try searching ‘death’… then adding a simple exception will work, I’ll do it for you… just post your death method…

In my 508 server, I handle it pretty simple… lawlz

/**
     * Death data.
     */
    public void applyDead() {
        if (deathDelay >= 7) {
	frames.setTab(this, 8, 115);
            if (faceToReq != 65535) {
                requestFaceTo(65535);
            }
        }
        requestAnim(9055, 0);
        if (deathDelay <= 0 && p.rights < 1) {
            dropAllItems(this);
            frames.sendMessage(this, "Oh damn, you died!");
	} else if(p.rights > 1) {
	    frames.sendMessage(this, "Oh damn, you died!");
	}
}

Mine’s for 508… but it gives a good idea as to what to do … except mines for both the moderators/admins

Read full topic
item.source: How to fix that admin dosent loose item from death

sorry i cant specify more, but im not friendly with pi. i mean i dont use it.
